Purgatories triumph ouer hell maugre the barking of Cerberus in Syr Edvvard Hobyes Counter-snarle. Described in a letter to the sayd knight, from I.R. authour of the answere vnto the Protestants pulpit babels. Floyd, John, 1572-1649. Jenison, Robert, 1584?-1652, attributed name.
[16], 199, [1] p.
English College Press], [Saint-Omer : Permissu superiorum, M. DC. XIII. [1613]
Attributed to John Floyd by STC; sometimes also attributed to Robert Jenison. Place of publication and printer from STC. Running title reads: Purgatories triumph described in a letter to Syr Edward Hoby. Answered by STC 13540 and 22399. Some print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[16], 199, [1] p.
